name: Scythe of the Crow
description: A powerful scythe, great for both offense and defense. Able to instantly kill its target within a certain distance.

normals.name: Normal Attack
normals.description:
While on the ground, swing the scythe to launch **5** consecutive attacks.
First Attack: Deal damage equal to **57.1%** of ATK plus **343** and knock the target back a short distance.
Second Attack: Deal damage equal to **49.1%** of ATK plus **295** and knock the target back a short distance.
Third Attack: Deal damage equal to **106.8%** of ATK plus **641** and knock the target back a short distance.
Fourth Attack: Deal damage equal to **109.5%** of ATK plus **657** and knock the target back a short distance.
Fifth Attack: Deal damage equal to **104.2%** of ATK plus **625**, **strongly suspend** the target, and cause the Wanderer to go airborne.

normals.name: Rising Scythe
normals.description:
While airborne or after jumping once, attack **5** times in a row.
First Attack: Deal damage equal to **63.4%** of ATK plus **380**.
Second Attack: Deal damage equal to **68.8%** of ATK plus **413**.
Third Attack: Deal damage equal to **190.5%** of ATK plus **1143**.
Fourth Attack: Deal damage equal to **213.6%** of ATK plus **1281**.
Fifth Attack: Deal damage equal to **173.9%** of ATK plus **1043** and knock the target down. The higher the location is when triggered, the more damage is dealt, up to **600%** damage.

normals.name: Asunder
normals.description:
Tap and hold normal attack while airborne (tap when a target is available), or use normal attack while climbing, jumping backward, or using the Jetpack to trigger Asunder.
While falling, deal damage equal to **12.5%** of ATK plus **75** each hit. Upon landing, deal damage equal to **71.9%** of ATK plus **431** and deliver a **knockdown**.
The higher the altitude when triggering the attack, the greater the damage dealt, up to **600%** damage.

normals.name: Returning Chainblade
normals.description:
After the fourth normal attack, hold the normal attack button to trigger Returning Chainblade.
Transform into a chainblade, dealing damage equal to **137.4%** of ATK plus **824** to nearby targets and pulling them in.

normals.name: Sneak Attack
normals.description: Approach the enemy from behind while crouching, then use normal attack to use Sneak Attack, dealing damage equal to **570%** of ATK plus **3420**.

dodge.name: Returning Chainblade
dodge.description:
Use normal attack during the short perfect dodge window (use a directional button before dodging) to trigger Rapid Lunge.
Deal up to **126.9%** of ATK plus **761** damage and pull in nearby enemies.

dodge.name: Domain of the Bat
dodge.description: When dodging, summon a domain of the bat that pulls the target into the center. Tap normal attack during the short period after dodging to swing the scythe, dealing up to **114.3%** of ATK plus **686** damage to the target.

dodge.name: Dodge
dodge.description: Dodge right before getting hit to trigger Phantasia, reducing the speed of enemies within the area. Become immune to hitstun while dodging for **0.5** seconds.

skill.name: Mortal Coil
skill.description: Swing the scythe, dealing damage equal to **499.9%** of ATK plus **2999**. Cooldown: **45** seconds.

discharge.name: Flaming Scythe
discharge.description: When **weapon charge** is full or **Phantasia** is triggered, upon switching to this weapon, **remove all debuffs from the Wanderer** and create a Flaming Scythe, dealing damage equal to **398.3%** of ATK plus **2390**. Lasts for **10** seconds. Additionally, spawn a Flaming Scythes Domain every **2** seconds. The scythes summon volcanic eruptions from the ground, which deal damage equal to **95%** of ATK plus **396** to targets and suspending them.

advancements.description: Increase shatter by **15%**. After shattering the target's shield, deal burn damage equal to **120%** of ATK to the target every second for **15** seconds.
Increase the current weapon's base HP growth by **16%**.
Increase damage dealt by **15%** for each enemy target within **6** meters, up to **30%**.
Increase the current weapon's base ATK growth by **32%**.
Increase damage dealt against HP shields or shielded enemies by **100%**.
Increase damage dealt by **10%** for each enemy slain for **30** seconds. Stack up to **3** times.
